description: A service class in a Java Spring application managing datasets, including upload, list, retrieval, download, and delete operations.

classes.name: DatasetService
classes.description: Service class providing core business logic for managing datasets in a web application.

methods.name: upload
methods.description: Uploads a dataset file, saves its metadata, and returns a DatasetResponse.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of all datasets as DatasetResponse objects.

methods.name: getEntity
methods.description: Retrieves a Dataset entity by its ID.

methods.name: download
methods.description: Provides access to download the dataset file as a Resource.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a dataset and its stored file given its ID.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a Dataset entity into a DatasetResponse DTO.
